title: Introduction to Crefal
brief_description: A picture of the land and people around Lake Patzcuaro, Mexico, site of the international fundamental education training and production centre for Latin America. At the Crefal Centre and in collaboration with UNESCO workers, training is given to village people to assist with maintaining traditional skills of fishing, farming and weaving.
